p: Quantitative data were analyzed using SPSS version 22.0 for Windows (Armonk, NY: IBM Corp). Descriptive statistics were used for frequency (n, %), and mean and standard deviations (SD) were used for total scores and subscale scores. Pair t tests assessed differences between pretest and posttest scores. Significance was set at p < 0.05 for statistical comparisons. Qualitative data were collected using from the learning sheets at the conclusion of each lesson.
